text: Saji Thomas is an Indian rower from Aleppey, Kerala. Thomas was a participant in three Asian Games and World championships. His teams won 13 medals in various international competitions. He won medals in all main boat classes of both sweep rowing and sculling in major regattas, the only Indian with this achievement.
